name: compileinstalljar
friendlyName: Compiles and Installs JAR using SBT
description: Compiles and Installs JAR using SBT
author: Microsoft DevLabs

inputs.name: clusterid
inputs.label: Cluster ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID of the Cluster to be started

inputs.name: workingDirectory
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The source folder where your `build.sbt` lives.

Examples:- Build: `$(Build.SourcesDirectory)`
- Release: $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)

inputs.name: failOnStderr
inputs.label: Fail on Standard Error
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is true, this task will fail if any errors are written to the StandardError stream.

inputs.name: packageName
inputs.label: JAR package name (overrides build.sbt)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name for the generated JAR package, without `.jar`. Overrides value on `build.sbt`.

inputs.name: packageVersion
inputs.label: Package Version (overrides build.sbt)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version for your package. You can use [Pipeline Variables](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/pipelines/build/variables?view=azure-devops&tabs=yaml#build-variables) to populate this one. Eg. `$(Build.BuildNumber)`.

inputs.name: scalaVersion
inputs.label: Scala Version (overrides build.sbt)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Scala Version to use on this build

inputs.name: sampleDataSetFilePath
inputs.label: Sample dataset path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The dataset sample to use to run the tests on the cluster
